text.text_translated: The Hunger Games are an annual event, which the Capitol organises to remind the districts that they are being punished for rebelling. Each year, one boy and one girl, who are between 12 and 18 years old, are chosen from every district by lottery. These chosen teenagers, known as 'tributes', must then compete in a battle where only one person can survive. The entire nation is forced to watch this event on television.
